Posted By: shmewdog (7/9/2012 2:10:29 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card is a fine defender if that's what you're looking for. All the "lolnoobIamPro" comments here forget that there need to be cards that introduce players to 1. how cards work, and 2. why some cards are better than others. This card does that. No, it isn't a card that will see competitive play, but that isn't how it's designed. It's a good card for what it is supposed to be.  
  
And the art is great.

posts.post_content:
Strictly [Border Patrol](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Border Patrol)?  
  
Not seeing much use for either, there's just no threat to a 5-drop that only swings for one when you could put [Serra Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Serra Angel) out instead (barring multicolor decks if you can't afford the WW), which has evasion, damage, and is freaking Serra Angel.
